statement:
Let $M$ be a compact smooth manifold, and let
${\operatorname{Diff}}^k(M)$ denote the space of $\mathcal{C}^k$
diffeomorphisms from $M$ to itself. For every $k\in {\mathbb{N}}$, the
set of Kupka-Smale diffeomorphisms is in the $\mathcal{C}^k$ Whitney
topology of ${\operatorname{Diff}}^k(M)$.
